attributes.action: Define what an MP’s job is.
attributes.additional_details:
An MP is elected to office and paid, paid to employ staff but with no job description and no compunction to assist their constituency at all.  

I believe there should be a basic job description to which an MP’s performance can be measured against eg responding to constituents’ requests, supporting local issues and acting in the benefit of their own constituents.
attributes.background: I want the government to define what they are paid to do (other than making laws and applying taxes, particularly what a local MP is accountable for and what their actual job is.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713100
